entries.title: Is the worst over for bitcoin and the rest of crypto?
entries.description: The meltdown of FTX has sent the price of bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies tumbling more than 60% this year...and the carnage has spread to publicly traded companies with exposure to digital assets.

entries.title: Antony Blinken says Biden administration supports zero-Covid protesters in China
entries.description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken said Sunday that the Biden administration supports the zero-COVID protesters in China, explaining that he will address the topic when he visits the country early next year.

entries.title: The surprising group that flooded stores over the holiday shopping weekend
entries.description: There's at least one group of shoppers excitedly hitting malls this holiday season — and they don't seem to be too bothered about pesky inflation eating into their discretionary dollars.

entries.title: DNA analysis of soil from paw prints could help save Sumatra's tigers
entries.description: Dr. Mrinalini Watsa, a researcher at San Diego Zoo in California, scoops up soil from a fresh paw print made by Rakan, a 4-year-old male Sumatran tiger who lives at the zoo, and secures it in a specimen jar.
